title: Understanding Schedule II Substances
text: Schedule II substances are defined by their potential for abuse and the possibility of leading to severe psychological or physical dependence. They are considered dangerous but have accepted medical uses.

title: Characteristics of Schedule II Substances
text: These substances have a high potential for abuse, which may lead to severe psychological or physical dependence. However, they also have accepted medical uses.

hintAnswer: no potential for abuse, with use potentially leading to severe psychological or physical dependence
title: Identifying Schedule II Substances
text: Which of the following characteristics best describes Schedule II substances?
choices: spray paints, markers, glue, gasoline, and cleaning fluids
no currently accepted medical use and a high potential for abuse
no potential for abuse, with use potentially leading to severe psychological or physical dependence
